solution_line_template: He installs {initial_cabinets_per_counter}*{multiplier}=<<{initial_cabinets_per_counter}*{multiplier}={cabinets_per_counter}>>{cabinets_per_counter} cabinets over each counter
So he installs {cabinets_per_counter}*{num_counters}=<<{cabinets_per_counter}*{num_counters}={total_new_cabinets}>>{total_new_cabinets} cabinets over counters
That means he installed a total of {total_new_cabinets}+{additional_cabinets}=<<{total_new_cabinets}+{additional_cabinets}={total_installed}>>{total_installed} cabinets
